What language are kernels written in?: O... where can I get the source code for the kernel ubuntu uses?
apt-get source linux-image-* (depends on the version you want)

that'll check out all the files used to build the package so you can rebuild them yourself; if you want to maintain modifications it might be easier to familiarize yourself with the debian maintainer tools, and stuff like pbuilder
